summary:
Inland water captain. Educator. Skills and personal communications trainer. Text editor. Writer for tour guide texts. Into Wim Hof's cold exposure, because the cold is such a great teacher. All in one. 

My history in jobs, education and the road of life itself  put me where am I today and I love it! I love helping people grow in their knowledge and skills. I love the energy of water. I love the power of well-written texts.  

Work hard - laugh hard. Sing along the road. Clean the ocean wherever you can. And keep on breathing, even when the water is icy cold.

projects.title: Introduction week organization 'El Cid'
projects.description: Hogeschool Leiden and Leiden University for the first time join together in organizing the 'El Cid' week, the one week in summer where all freshmen get to know Leiden city, all student associations, and each other. In August 2014, Hogeschool Leiden for the first time in 30 years will join the organization. My colleague Astrid and I are responsible for connecting the Hogeschool to the organizing committee of the University, and to ensure that all Hogeschool freshmen who will attend, have an awesome time.

profile_positions.description:
Daytourboat skipper in the 'Groene Hart' region, South Holland. Explanations in four languages about the 'polder' landscape, working of the windmills, history of the region, effects of climate change.

Proud writer of the tour information for the port tour of Amsterdam Boat Cruises. For this particular tour I created the idea telling the stories of five generations of a family for whom Port of Amsterdam has been leading in work and their lives. They share their stories during the two hour tour. 

Skills trainer for new captains. Crew trainer in hospitality for new young crew in service.

Text editor for the company's publishings as well as the program booklet, several multilanguage flyers.
profile_positions.title: Captain & trainer & text writer/editor

profile_positions.description:
Voor de faculteit Management & Bedrijf in mijn oude functie, maar dan nu online tijdens de coronapandemie: 
* Online trainer communicatieve vaardigheden: presentatieskills, basis-gespreksvaardigheden aan 1e jaars studenten Recht en Sociaal Juridische Dienstverlening
* Online docent-assessor van praktijktoetsen 4e jaars studenten Communicatie: mondelinge toetsen over het persoonlijk portfolio
profile_positions.title: Trainer communicatie skills, docent-assessor

profile_positions.location: Mediterranean, Cape Verde, Caribbean, Azores, Atlantic ocean, Scandinavia
profile_positions.description:
"Meeting the world on board". These have been four incredible years, where I have worked as deck crew on board a 55m sailing vessel in the Caribbean, the Mediterranean, and three Atlantic Ocean crossings. 

I am very happy to have had the experience. For one, I met the most amazing people. From France, New Zealand, Poland, Germany... saw the ocean in its bluest colors. And now... it's time to drop the sails and set foot on land.

The contracts: 
2020
* Sailing-Classics, on Rhea. April-May: five week shipyard in Dénia, Spain, during the corona pandemic. 

2018
* Safier sailing: Tromso Norway, Sweden west coast, Denmark, Holland.
* Sailing- Classics on Chronos. April-July: Rating deck, 10-day crossing from the Carib to Bahamas, Crew during the first-time exploration tour in the Bahamas. Ocean crossing from Nassau to Gibraltar in 21 days, shipyard in Gibraltar, then on to Corsica and Sardinia. 

2017
* Sept-Nov: Rating deck on Rhea, Sailing Classics. Mediterranean. Visiting Boat Monaco and Voiles-St-Tropez. 
* April-June on Chronos: Deck crew. Sailing area: Caribbean islands including Antigua Classic Yacht Regatta, northerly crossing back to Europe via the Azores islands, Mediterranean sea. Special characteristics of this tour: a three day storm on the Atlantic, very gusty winds on the Azores. Shipyard.

2016
* Oct-Dec on Chronos: Service department crew. Sailing-Classics. Responsible for Housekeeping-, laundry-, food & beverage tasks. Sailing area: Mediterranean Sea, crossing to Cape Verde islands, Atlantic crossing to the Caribbean islands. One week at the ship yard.
profile_positions.title: Deck crew on commercial seagoing sailing vessels under STCW regulation

profile_positions.description:
Trainer
- Training students in presentation skills and interpersonal communication: bad news interview, mediation, job functioning interviews, job assessment interview. 
- Organizing a 'train the trainer' course for our 2nd year students, to train job application skills for 2nd year students in Law and Social Services

Coach 
- Coaching students in their 2nd and 3rd year internships, visiting their internship companies, leading 6-weekly 'intervisie' meetings
- Coaching students in their 4th year thesis process. 

Teacher & developer of education
- Developing the (online) curriculum and teaching classes in communication- and presentation skills, social media recruitment, and Social and Organizational Psychology for HRM students.
- Participating in a school broad project group for developing online learning.
- Educating students in the fields of Psychology of Organization and Health, Recruitment, Staffing, Outplacement, Reintegration, Job mobility.  
- Joining NVAO accreditatie 

Public Relations
- Co-ordinating the Public Relations team of our HRM education & extra training of participating students in their presentation skills, joining all 'open house' events for new students
- Connecting personal network into the school's curriculum

Social media related to HRM and education
- Content manager of the Facebookpage HS Leiden - Human Resource Management.
  via http://goo.gl/R999n  until September 2014.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer & Trainer in HRM, communication skills, and Organizational Psychology

profile_positions.description:
Advising all parties involved (employer, employee, Arbo arts, Bedrijfsmaatschappelijk werk) on how to co-operate in outplacement and reintegration tracks in order to reach the set goal: new work outside the organization for the employee involved. Coaching employees in their individual and/or group outplacement- and reintegration tracks. Acquisition and sales.
Clients/companies: retail industry, distribution centers, hospitality. 

Job content
Consultant for organizations who need to let go employees due to reorganisation or health issues. Regular contact with Bedrijfsmaatschappelijk werk, Verzuimcoordinatoren, Arbodiensten, Arboartsen.
Training groups of employees in all job application skills needed. 
Method used: TNO 'Jobstraining' based on American psychological research in self-efficacy. See also www.tno.nl/skills
Individual coaching based on Albert Ellis' RET method, and the Dutch Solution-based coaching.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Outplacement & Reintegratie

profile_positions.description: Recruitment and selection for candidates within the national government in The Hague.

profile_positions.description: Project job mobility consultant for TPG Post (now Postnl.nl) Den Haag en Rotterdam & ABN Amro (Kompas Mobiliteitscentrum): (un)voluntary outplacement of staff. Coaching, jobsearch, interpersonal skills training.
profile_positions.title: Consultant mobiliteit, gedetacheerd
